// Pivot 0, 0
int Pinball[16] = {
	408, 380,
	408, 345,
	411, 342,
	416, 342,
	419, 345,
	419, 380,
	416, 383,
	412, 383
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float Pinball[16] = {
	0.708333f, 0.494792f,
	0.708333f, 0.449219f,
